title: Violet the Organ Grinder: Innocence
description: Arriving in the deep south, Violet overhears her Master making arrangements with the man of the farmhouse. It's no holds barred for the next 24 hours. Violet can't refuse the tempting offer of candy and a wet 'n wild ride during a little sweet 'n sticky playtime. ***Note*** This novella contains over 19,000 words, and uses graphic language and explicit descriptions. This erotic tale is not for the prudish, the squeamish or the faint-of-heart. Intended for MATURE AUDIENCES only!
author: July Cumming
